name: Robert J. JONES, Administrator of Estate of Christine Jones, Decedent; Susan Zavar; Kimberly Jones; Neal R. Jones (Minor), Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellee

parties: Robert J. JONES, Administrator of Estate of Christine Jones, Decedent; Susan Zavar; Kimberly Jones; Neal R. Jones (Minor), Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 21st day of July, 1998, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
713 A.2d 632
Robert J. JONES, Administrator of Estate of Christine Jones, Decedent; Susan Zavar; Kimberly Jones; Neal R. Jones (Minor), Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 21, 1998.
